tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE sensitive_patient_information (
    patient_id INT,
    patient_name VARCHAR(255),
    patient_ssn VARCHAR(50) ENCRYPTED,
    address VARCHAR(255),
    phone_number VARCHAR(15),
    PRIMARY KEY (patient_id)
)

CREATE TABLE Patients (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  patient_ssn VARCHAR(11) ENCRYPTED,
  patient_dob DATE,
  patient_address VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE MedicalRecords (
  record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  doctor_id INT,
  record_date DATE,
  diagnosis TEXT,
  prescription TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES Patients(patient_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (doctor_id) REFERENCES Doctors(doctor_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Patients (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name STRING,
    patient_dob DATE,
    patient_address STRING,
    patient_ssn STRING
);

CREATE TABLE Appointments (
    appointment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    appointment_date DATE,
    patient_id INT,
    doctor_id INT,
    CONSTRAINT fk_patient_id FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES Patients(patient_id),
    CONSTRAINT fk_doctor_id FOREIGN KEY (doctor_id) REFERENCES Doctors(doctor_id)
);

CREATE TABLE patients (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name VARCHAR(50),
    last_name VARCHAR(50),
    ssn VARCHAR(11) ENCRYPTED,
    dob DATE,
    medical_history JSONB
);

CREATE TABLE doctors (
    doctor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name VARCHAR(50),
    last_name VARCHAR(50),
    specialty VARCHAR(50),
    license_number VARCHAR(20) ENCRYPTED
);

CREATE TABLE appointments (
    appointment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT REFERENCES patients(patient_id),
    doctor_id INT REFERENCES doctors(doctor_id),
    appointment_date DATE,
    appointment_time TIME
);

CREATE TABLE Patients (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(50),
  date_of_birth DATE,
  address VARCHAR(100),
  medical_record TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Doctors (
  doctor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  doctor_name VARCHAR(50),
  specialization VARCHAR(50),
  department VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE MedicalRecords (
  record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  doctor_id INT,
  record_date DATE,
  diagnosis TEXT,
  treatment_plan TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE AccessControl (
  user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  role VARCHAR(50),
  permissions VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE AuditLogs (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  user_id INT,
  activity VARCHAR(100)
)
